what: Estimate Prevalence of Elevated PRS Among First-Degree Relatives
title: Get started
text: function enables user estimate prevalence elevated polygenic risk among first-degree relatives probands elevated polygenic risk (within top q PRS distribution). , define elevated risk probands top 25% PRS distribution. can calculate prevalence elevated risk first-degree relatives:

what: Estimate Prevalence of Disease Among First-Degree Relatives
title: Get started
text: function enables user estimate prevalence disease among first-degree relatives probands elevated polygenic risk (within top q PRS distribution), based disease population prevalence K, proportion variability (r2) explained PRS r. , estimate disease prevalance among first-degree relatives proband top 1% PRS distribution, r2 PRS 0.1 disease prevalence 5%.
